flavorText: Zendikar is a brutal taskmaster, but sometimes it offers unexpected solace.

foreignData.flavorText: Zendikar ist wie ein brutaler Zuchtmeister, doch unerwartet findet man manchmal auch ein wenig Trost.
foreignData.name: Ruhe für die Erschöpften
foreignData.text:
Ein Spieler deiner Wahl erhält 4 Lebenspunkte dazu.
Landung — Falls ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle in diesem Zug ins Spiel gekommen ist, erhält dieser Spieler stattdessen 8 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: Zendikar es un capataz brutal, pero a veces ofrece un descanso inesperado.
foreignData.name: Descanso para los agotados
foreignData.text:
El jugador objetivo gana 4 vidas.
Aterrizaje — Si una tierra entró al campo de batalla bajo tu control este turno, en vez de eso, ese jugador gana 8 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: Zendikar est une maîtresse brutale, mais elle offre parfois un réconfort inespéré.
foreignData.name: Du repos pour les misérables
foreignData.text:
Le joueur ciblé gagne 4 points de vie.
Toucheterre — Si vous avez fait arriver un terrain sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle ce tour-ci, ce joueur gagne 8 points de vie à la place.

foreignData.flavorText: Zendikar è un brutale aguzzino, ma a volte offre insperate consolazioni.
foreignData.name: Riposo per gli Esausti
foreignData.text:
Un giocatore bersaglio guadagna 4 punti vita.
Terraferma — Se hai fatto entrare nel campo di battaglia una terra sotto il tuo controllo in questo turno, quel giocatore guadagna invece 8 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: ゼンディカーは残酷な長であるが、時に予想外の癒しを与えてくれることもある。
foreignData.name: 疲弊の休息
foreignData.text:
プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは４点のライフを得る。
上陸 ― このターン、あなたのコントロール下で土地が戦場に出ている場合、代わりにそのプレイヤーは８点のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: Zendikar é um capataz cruel, mas às vezes oferece um consolo inesperado.
foreignData.name: Repouso dos Cansados
foreignData.text:
O jogador alvo ganha 4 pontos de vida.
Aterragem — Se você teve um terreno que entrou no campo de batalha sob o seu controle neste turno, em vez disso, aquele jogador ganha 8 pontos de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Зендикар не ведает жалости, но иногда предлагает неожиданное облегчение.
foreignData.name: Покой для Утомленных
foreignData.text:
Целевой игрок получает 4 жизни.
Землепад — Если земля вышла на поле битвы под вашим контролем в этом ходу, тот игрок получает 8 жизней вместо этого.

foreignData.flavorText: 赞迪卡好似凶蛮的工头，但它有时也会提供意外的抚慰。
foreignData.name: 疲惫歇息
foreignData.text:
目标牌手获得4点生命。
地落～如果本回合中有地在你的操控下进战场，则改为该牌手获得8点生命。

name: Rest for the Weary
originalText:
Target player gains 4 life.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that player gains 8 life instead.

rulings.text: Whether you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn is checked as this spell resolves, not as you cast it.
Having more than one land enter the battlefield under your control this turn provides no additional benefit.

The landfall ability checks for an action that has happened in the past. It doesn’t matter if a land that entered the battlefield under your control previously in the turn is still on the battlefield, is still under your control, or is still a land.
Once the spell resolves, having a land enter the battlefield under your control provides no further benefit.
The effect of this spell’s landfall ability replaces its normal effect. If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, only the landfall-based effect happens.

text:
Target player gains 4 life.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that player gains 8 life instead.
